name: 2019 11th International Conference on Machine Learning and Computing (ICMLC 2019)--ACM, Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: Paper Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into #ACM Conference Proceedings#, indexed by \*\*Ei Compendex\*\*,\*\*Scopus\*\*. ※ICMLC 2018 Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-6353-2) has already submitted to ACM. ICMLC 2017 ACM Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-4817-1) has been included in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus already. ※Conference Speakers: Prof. Tianrui Li, Southwest Jiaotong University, China; Prof. David Greenhalgh, University of Strathclyde, UK; Assoc. Prof. Lin Huang, Metropolitan State University of Denver, USA. == Submission Methods: 1\. Full Paper (Presentation and publication) 2\. Abstract (Presentation only) Please log in the Electronic Submission System(https://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icmlc2019) or submit paper to: icmlc@asr.org.
